Interrupts.Name: Adhere
Interrupts.Trigger: When damaged by an ability from an adjacent foe.
Interrupts.Effects: That foe to make a save or adhere to its hide. While adhered, the foe cannot move or be placed more than 1 space from the [name], and when the [name] moves or teleports, they are removed from the battlefield, then placed adjacent to the [name] when it stops moving. They can save to repeat this effect at the end of their turn. A [name] can only adhere to one character at once, and can choose which to keep or lose.

Actions.Name: Savage Fang
Effects: Deal 3 damage to all other foes adjacent to the [name].
Deals bonus damage to characters inside its deep water zones or characters adhered to the [name].

Actions.Name: Waterspout
Actions.Description: The [name] spurts fetid water, blinding a foe in range. Blinded foes, or foes inside its deep water zone, take 3 damage.

Actions.Name: Submerge
Actions.Description: A character inside one of the [name]'s deep water zones is teleported to any space inside one of its other zones. Foes can pass a save to avoid this effect, but are dazed on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Sink
Actions.Description: The [name] disperses into seaweed and water and reappears in any space inside one of its deep water zones, teleporting.
